projects.title: Weather website with API
projects.description: The Weather Website Application is an interactive web platform that provides real-time weather information to users. This application harnesses HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript technologies to create a user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Portfolio HTML5 & CSS3
projects.description: I made a cool portfolio using HTML5 and CSS3. It shows off my work and skills in a neat and stylish way. Check it out to see what I can do.

projects.title: Simple portfolio HTML5 & CSS3
projects.description: I made a cool portfolio using HTML5 and CSS3. It shows off my work and skills in a neat and stylish way. Check it out to see what I can do.

projects.title: ToDo list with JavaScript
projects.description: I made a to-do list using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. You can add, delete, and update tasks easily. It helps you stay organized and manage your tasks smoothly.

projects.title: Landing page school
projects.description: I made a cool landing page for school using HTML5 and CSS3. It shows off my work and skills in a neat and stylish way. Check it out to see what I can do.

projects.title: Sign up form with validation
projects.description: I designed a signup page using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with validation. Users can enter their information, and JavaScript ensures that all fields are correctly filled out before submission.

projects.title: Pos system management
projects.description: Our POS system combines HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL for efficient transaction handling and inventory management. With a user-friendly interface and real-time updates, it streamlines sales and optimizes business operations.

projects.title: Shorten URL Website
projects.description: Our Shorten URL website provides an easy way to shorten long URLs. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL, this tool makes URL management more efficient.

projects.title: Web translator with API
projects.description: I created a web translator using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, and an API. The interface is built with HTML and CSS, JavaScript manages interactions, and PHP connects to the MySQL database. The API handles the translations, making it a fast and user-friendly tool.

projects.title: TempMail Generator
projects.description: I created a temporary email generator using Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, PHP, and API for efficient email management.

projects.title: Quotes generator with API
projects.description: I created a quotes generator using HTML, Tailwind, and an API. The API generates random quotes, and the interface makes it easy to display and interact with them.

projects.title: ErrePress web app
projects.description: I created a web app using Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, and a API. The app allows users to perform various tasks through a dynamic and responsive interface.

projects.title: Resume builder web app
projects.description: I created a web app using Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, and a API. The app allows users to perform various tasks through a dynamic and responsive interface.

projects.title: Laravel-alert package
projects.description: This package is based on the Laravel Framework (php) and provides a simple, customizable way to manage alert messages in your Laravel application.
